ABOUT.TITLE: What is StatsGlowMind?
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION:
StatsGlowMind is a web application dedicated to the National Basketball Association (NBA), a platform that goes beyond simple exhibition of statistics and results to offer a range of features designed to inform, analyze, and predict.

This application provides real-time information on the NBA, as well as the season standings, the playoff bracket, the schedule with matches and results, the league leaders by the desired category, and statistics for all NBA teams and players. You can find the basketball terms used in the application in the Glossary.

StatsGlowMind has the ability to provide real-time player analysis, leveraging player statistics from each season game, thus generating analytical graphs that show player performance throughout the league season.

Additionally, this application goes further by offering predictions on the outcomes of future matches that the user can select. By integrating a model with the Random Forest Machine Learning algorithm trained with historical data from the current season, the application provides users with the probability of each team winning, adding more interest and excitement to following the NBA season.
ABOUT.DEVELOPMENT_DESCRIPTION: This project is developed in Angular using TypeScript, HTML, and CSS; it uses the Firebase tool as a hosting platform for the database, file storage, user authentication, backend development with cloud functions (Python), and provides hosting service. To display real-time information, the 'API-NBA' API obtained from the RapidAPI platform is used.
ABOUT.DESIGN_DESCRIPTION: For the web application design, the following were used: Bootstrap which provides a responsive design, Angular Material which makes the application more attractive, and Flaticon where the interface icons were collected.
ABOUT.SOCIAL_DESCRIPTION: You can access the project repository on GitHub, where you can see the structure, code, and documentation used for the project. On LinkedIn is where I publish my professional profile and acquired achievements. You can also contact me through Outlook for any queries or professional collaboration.

GLOSSARY.GP: Games Played: Number of games played.
GLOSSARY.FGM: Field Goals Made: Number of field goals made.
GLOSSARY.FGA: Field Goals Attempted: Number of field goals attempted.
GLOSSARY.FG_PERCENT: Field Goal Percentage: Percentage of field goals made.
GLOSSARY.TPM: Three-Point Field Goals Made: Number of three-pointers made.
GLOSSARY.TPF: Three-Point Field Goals Failed: Number of three-pointers missed.
GLOSSARY.TPA: Three-Point Field Goals Attempted: Number of three-pointers attempted.
GLOSSARY.TP_PERCENT: Three-Point Field Goal Percentage: Percentage of three-pointers made.
GLOSSARY.2P: Two-Point Field Goals: Two-point field goals.
GLOSSARY.2PM: Two-Point Field Goals Made: Number of two-point field goals made.
GLOSSARY.2PF: Two-Point Field Goals Failed: Number of two-point field goals missed.
GLOSSARY.2PA: Two-Point Field Goals Attempted: Number of two-point field goals attempted.
GLOSSARY.FTM: Free Throws Made: Number of free throws made.
GLOSSARY.FTF: Free Throws Failed: Number of free throws missed.
GLOSSARY.FTA: Free Throws Attempted: Number of free throws attempted.
GLOSSARY.FT_PERCENT: Free Throw Percentage: Percentage of free throws made.
GLOSSARY.OREB: Offensive Rebounds: Number of offensive rebounds.
GLOSSARY.DREB: Defensive Rebounds: Number of defensive rebounds.
GLOSSARY.PF: Personal Fouls: Number of personal fouls.
GLOSSARY.PLUS_MINUS: Plus/Minus: Point differential when a player is on the court.
GLOSSARY.POS: Position: Player's position (PG, SG, SF, PF, C).
GLOSSARY.AVG_PTS: Average Points: Average points scored per game.

ERRORS.REQUIRED_LOGIN: You need to log in to access this page.

MAIN.NBA_DESCRIPTION: Standings in each conference, Playoffs, Games and Results, and League Leaders.
MAIN.TEAMS_DESCRIPTION: Statistics of NBA teams and the players of each team.
MAIN.ANALYSIS_DESCRIPTION: Analysis of each player's statistics to calculate their performance in different areas.
MAIN.PREDICTIONS_DESCRIPTION: Predictions of upcoming games based on each team's statistics for the season.

ERRORS.NO_TEAMS: Both home and visitor team must be selected.

ERRORS.PASSWORDS: The entered passwords must be the same.
ERRORS.INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Some of the data does not meet the registration conditions.
